name: Well Warrior
description:
Death is not an escape from the chaos and suffering of the dungeons. Fight through rooms of enemies in your quest to reach the well and be granted eternal peace in this fast paced top-down shooter roguelike.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Aim and shoot - MOUSE

Change weapon - E

Refill health - Q

This game was submitted as part of the brackeys 2023.1 game jam and made in 1 week. All feedback is highly appreciated.
